name: influxdbWrite
description: This method executes a manual InfluxDB write in the database connected to Homegear InfluxDB. This can be used to log your own values e. g. from within your scripts or Node-BLUE. It is only available, when Homegear InfluxDB is installed and running. When logging has been enabled for a variable using influxdbSetLogging there is no need to call influxdbWrite.

parameters.name: useLowResRetentionPolicy
parameters.description: When set to true the data is written to the low resolution retention policy. When set to false the high resolution retention policy is used.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data in InfluxDB's Line Protocol format.

returnValue: Returns Void on success or Struct on InfluxDB error.

errors.description: InfluxDB error. The error struct contains a descriptive error message.
